definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Non-institutionalized control is the primary control manner of tribe society.
sentences.chinese: 非制度化控制是部落社會主要的控制方式。

sentences.english: It has also institutionalized close coordination among government ministries on the front line of disaster relief.
sentences.chinese: 還使各部委在救災前線的密切協作制度化。
媒體的造謠變得制度化了。

sentences.english: The third chapter elaborates Chopin's questioning about the institutionalized motherhood in the patriarchal society.
sentences.chinese: 第三章探討肖班質疑父權制下被制度化的母性。

sentences.english: It was Institutionalization and gradual perfection of the Dual-system under the control of the country.
sentences.chinese: 在國家的影響下，“雙元制”的制度化並日趨完善。

sentences.english: “We’re looking at institutionalizing a process,” she said.
sentences.chinese: “我們正在研究如何將流程制度化，”她說。

sentences.english: This practice is not only common, but institutionalized.
sentences.chinese: 這種實踐不僅很普遍，而且已經制度化了。

sentences.english: We set the hortative methods for teachers to praise teachers' performances.
sentences.chinese: 以制度化獎勵措施重視教師表現，激勵教師。

sentences.english: Chapter five mainly proceeds with how to surmount and avoid the non- institutionalized phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 第五章主要就如何克服和避免非制度化現象而展開。

sentences.english: Russia has pushed hardest for the institutionalization of summits.
sentences.chinese: 俄國在努力推動峯會的制度化。

sentences.english: The public cemetery is for the institution the place which buries the behavior to provide.
sentences.chinese: 公墓是爲制度化的下葬行爲提供的場所。

sentences.english: Wood paneling softens the institutional feel of the interior.
sentences.chinese: 木製鑲板淡化了內部制度化的氣氛。

sentences.english: The Strategist School makes situation stand out; the Legalist School stresses institutionalization.
sentences.chinese: 兵家講勢，法家強調恃人不敢爲非的制度化建設。

sentences.english: New social classes of non- institutionalized political participation should not be overlooked.
sentences.chinese: 新社會階層的非制度化政治參與也不容忽視。

sentences.english: Japan shows the failings of institutionalised sexism.
sentences.chinese: 制度化性別歧視在日本遭遇了失敗。

definition: normalized (statistics)/to normalize (relations etc)/to become the norm
socialization/to socialize/to fit into society/to train sb for society
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
rule of law/to rule by law
